Program Description \n(guideline): $30 rebate for new ENERGY STAR® rated electric clothes dryer
Other Restrictions:
*All rebates must be requested within 90 days of installation.
Must submit:
*Proof of purchase through receipt and/or invoice
*Energy Guide label showing ENERGY STAR® certification for appliances.

Program Description \n(guideline): $90 rebate for new ENERGY STAR® electric hybrid heat pump clothes dryer
Other Restrictions:
*All rebates must be requested within 90 days of installation.
Must submit:
*Proof of purchase through receipt and/or invoice
*Energy Guide label showing ENERGY STAR® certification for appliances.

Program Description \n(guideline): $100 rebate per unit for electric-to-induction replacements
Other Restrictions:
*Replacement of gas units with induction requires verification of old gas cooktop/range. 
*All rebates must be requested within 90 days of installation.
Must submit:
*Photographs of the old unit.
*Itemized receipt for induction cooktop/range purchase.

Program Description \n(guideline): $350 rebate per unit for gas-to-induction replacement or new construction
Bonus Description: Additional 25% off the purchase price up to $150 for gas-to-induction replacement/new construction
Other Restrictions:
*Replacement of gas units with induction requires verification of old gas cooktop/range. 
*All rebates must be requested within 90 days of installation.
Must submit:
*Photographs of the old unit.
*Itemized receipt for induction cooktop/range purchase.

Program Description \n(guideline): 25% off purchase price up to $1000 for used BEVs
Other Restrictions:
One rebate per VIN
All rebates must be requested within 90 days of purchase.

Applications for rebates must include proof of purchase: Original or copy of receipt naming the item purchased, date of purchase, and price

Program Description \n(guideline): 25% off purchase price up to $500 for qualified used PHEVs
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Used PHEVs must have an EPA rated all-electric range of at least 25 miles
Other Restrictions:
One rebate per VIN
All rebates must be requested within 90 days of purchase.

Applications for rebates must include proof of purchase: Original or copy of receipt naming the item purchased, date of purchase, and price

Program Description \n(guideline): 25% off purchase price up to $250 for new electric motorcycles, mopeds, and UTVs
Other Restrictions: Limit of 2 motorcycles/mopeds/UTVs per member account

Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of the total cost of installation and equipment, up to $1250 for residential EV chargers
Rebate Value*: 50% of the total cost of installation and equipment, up to $1250
Other Restrictions:
Portable EV chargers do not qualify for the rebate

All rebates must be requested within 90 days of install.

Applications for rebates must include proof of purchase/installation and documentation that the EV charger is permanently installed. This includes:

Original or copy of receipt naming the item purchased, date of purchase, and price

Program Description \n(guideline): $50 rebate for Electric Resistance Water Heaters in new construction
Other Restrictions: Must be new construction.

Program Description \n(guideline): $70 rebate for Electric Resistance Water Heaters replacing natural gas or propane water heaters or if a member signs up for Time-of-Use rate
Other Restrictions: Must be replacing propane or natural gas OR member must sign up for Time of Use rate.

Program Description \n(guideline): $950 rebate for Electric Heat Pump Water Heaters (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
Other Restrictions: Must be ENERGY STAR® rated.

Program Description \n(guideline): $22 per kW rebate for controlled off peak heating (ETS) units controlled by timers or a master control system
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Minimum qualifying load for ETS is 1 kW.
Other Restrictions:
*Permanently installed units only.
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation to qualify.
*All items must be new

Program Description \n(guideline): $18 per kW rebate for heated floors controlled by timers or master control system
Other Restrictions:
*Permanently installed units only.
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation to qualify.
*All items must be new

Program Description \n(guideline): $1175 rebate for standard Air Source Heat Pumps that are at most 2 tons (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Equipment Standards Restrictions:
(Standard ASHP)
Required HSPF >= 9.0 and SEER >= 15 or, HSPF2 >= 7.6 and SEER >= 14.3
Other Restrictions:
*Incentive amount is the lower of stated rebate or 50% of equipment cost
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description \n(guideline): $2300 rebate for standard Air Source Heat Pumps over 2 tons (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Equipment Standards Restrictions:
(Standard ASHP)
Required HSPF >= 9.0 and SEER >= 15 or, HSPF2 >= 7.6 and SEER >= 14.3
Other Restrictions:
*Incentive amount is the lower of stated rebate or 50% of equipment cost
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description \n(guideline): $1500 rebate for Cold Climate Tier 2 Air Source Heat Pumps that are at most 2 tons (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Equipment Standards Restrictions: (Cold-Climate ASHP) required HSPF > = 10.0 and SEER > = 16 or, HSPF2 >=8.5 and SEER >=15.2; variable speed compressor or a minimum of 3 stages (settings for fan speed)
Other Restrictions:
*Incentive amount is the lower of stated rebate or 50% of equipment cost
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description \n(guideline): $5400 rebate for Cold Climate Air Source Heat Pumps over 2 tons (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost)
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Equipment Standards Restrictions: (Cold-Climate ASHP) required HSPF > = 10.0 and SEER > = 16 or, HSPF2 >=8.5 and SEER >=15.2; variable speed compressor or a minimum of 3 stages (settings for fan speed)
Other Restrictions:
*Incentive amount is the lower of stated rebate or 50% of equipment cost
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description \n(guideline): $450 rebate per ton for air-to-water units with EER at least 19 and COP at least 4
Bonus Description: $100/unit additional incentive for central air source with integrated controlled Electric Thermal Storage (ETS) backup in lieu of a separate ETS incentive
Other Restrictions:
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Technology*: Ground Source Heat Pump (GSHP) / Geothermal HP
Program Description \n(guideline): $500 rebate per ton for new installations of Ground Source Heat Pumps
Bonus Description: Additional matching rebate of $500 per ton for new installations, up to $2500 per installation
Other Restrictions:
*New ground source heat pump systems are eligible
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Technology*: Ground Source Heat Pump (GSHP) / Geothermal HP
Program Description \n(guideline): $250 rebate per ton for existing unit replacement of Ground Source Heat Pumps
Other Restrictions:
*New ground source heat pump systems are eligible
*Rebates must be applied for within 90 days of installation
*All items must be new

Program Description \n(guideline): $200 rebate per unit for Evaporative Coolers
Other Restrictions: Limit 2 per account. No window or portable units.

Program Description \n(guideline): 25% of cost up to $150 rebate for E-bike
Other Restrictions:
*Minimum purchase price of $50
*Submit your complete rebate application within 90 days of purchase.
*Final invoice(s) must include the member’s name, the order purchase date, and the total cost.
*New equipment only
*Battery and corded electric equipment only
*Members limited to one rebate per product except for e-bikes
*An aggregated maximum rebate of $300 per member account (excludes riding lawn mowers)
*Once you meet your $300 max for the products below, you will be capped out until January 1 of the next year.
*Rebate is for the purchase price only and does not include taxes or shipping – Please state item price only on application

Electric lawn equipment 
(mower, edger, leaf blower, weedwhacker)

Program Description \n(guideline): $1000 rebate per unit for a non-dispatchable Battery Storage unit on a Time of Use rate
Stacking Details:
*Rated for installation at elevation
*Installations must comply with all applicable electrical and building codes.
*Installations must operate on a Time of Use rate when a TOU rate option may become available
*Installations must provide battery system data access when this technology may become available
*Proof of installation
-Picture of installed unit
-Electrician invoice
-State electrical permit
*All items must be new

Program Description \n(guideline): $2000 rebate per unit for a dispatchable  Battery Storage unit on a Time of Use rate
Stacking Details:
*Rated for installation at elevation
*Installations must comply with all applicable electrical and building codes.
*Installations must operate on a Time of Use rate when a TOU rate option may become available
*Installations must provide battery system data access when this technology may become available
*Proof of installation
-Picture of installed unit
-Electrician invoice
-State electrical permit
*All items must be new

Program Description \n(guideline): $25 rebate per thermostat
Stacking Details: Thermostat must be WiFi network capable and installed at member consumer account. Limit of 2 thermostats per member account for standard/low-voltage applications. Limit of 5 thermostats per member account for line-voltage applications. All items must be new.

Program Description \n(guideline): $50 rebate per thermostat if enrolled in GCEA’s TOU (time-of-use) rate
Stacking Details: Thermostat must be WiFi network capable and installed at member consumer account. Limit of 2 thermostats per member account for standard/low-voltage applications. Limit of 5 thermostats per member account for line-voltage applications. All items must be new.
